duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle the administration, maintenance, and patching of servers to help upgrade, install, and troubleshoot multiple applications.
Work with vendors and cross-functional teams to ensure problems within applications and hardware (servers) are addressed.
Work in a container environment and utilize banking-specific knowledge to support applications.
Provide on-call support 24/7, addressing failed components or technical issues and providing resolution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
